entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
